body_html: @avostryakov are you using MultiRNNCell? is this unidirectional or bidirectional rnn? you could also try using the new LSTMBlockCell in tf.contrib.rnn instead of the base BasicLSTMCell, which may improve your performance. Let me know how that works for you.
body_text: @avostryakov are you using MultiRNNCell?  is this unidirectional or bidirectional rnn?  you could also try using the new LSTMBlockCell in tf.contrib.rnn instead of the base BasicLSTMCell, which may improve your performance.  Let me know how that works for you.
body: @avostryakov are you using MultiRNNCell?  is this unidirectional or bidirectional rnn?  you could also try using the new LSTMBlockCell in `tf.contrib.rnn` instead of the base `BasicLSTMCell`, which _may_ improve your performance.  Let me know how that works for you.
